writing.name: CONTINUE
writing.text: Continue

writing.name: DAY2_TRANSITION_01_HALLWAY_DIALOGUE_01
writing.text: You see Ash asking Max for help again.

writing.name: DAY2_TRANSITION_01_HALLWAY_DIALOGUE_02
writing.text: It's something about the books this time. Oh yeah Max just lent him a book.

writing.name: DAY2_TRANSITION_01_HALLWAY_DIALOGUE_03
writing.text: Suddenly a student trips and dropers her books. Max and you rush to help her.

writing.name: DAY2_TRANSITION_01_HALLWAY_DIALOGUE_04
writing.text: Phew! It was lucky that she didn't fall down.

writing.name: DAY2_TRANSITION_02_DESK_DIALOGUE_01
writing.text: Did you do the homework?

writing.name: DAY2_TRANSITION_02_DESK_DIALOGUE_01_CHOICE_01
writing.text: Yeah! It took me forever.

writing.name: DAY2_TRANSITION_02_DESK_DIALOGUE_01_CHOICE_02
writing.text: What homework?!

writing.name: DAY2_TRANSITION_02_DESK_DIALOGUE_01_CHOICE_01_DIALOGUE_01
writing.text: Me too. It was so long! Do you like Bon Jovi?

writing.name: DAY2_TRANSITION_02_DESK_DIALOGUE_01_CHOICE_01_DIALOGUE_02
writing.text: Yeah, my mom gave me the new longplay as a Christmas gift.

writing.name: DAY2_TRANSITION_02_DESK_DIALOGUE_01_CHOICE_01_DIALOGUE_03
writing.text: Oh that's amazing. I'm dying to hear it!

writing.name: DAY2_TRANSITION_02_DESK_DIALOGUE_01_CHOICE_02_DIALOGUE_01
writing.text: Oh nevermind. I just realized it's for next week. Do you like Bon Jovi?

writing.name: DAY2_TRANSITION_02_DESK_DIALOGUE_01_CHOICE_02_DIALOGUE_02
writing.text: Yeah, my mom gave me the new longplay as a Christmas gift.

writing.name: DAY2_TRANSITION_02_DESK_DIALOGUE_01_CHOICE_02_DIALOGUE_03
writing.text: Oh that's amazing. I'm dying to hear it.

writing.name: DAY2_TRANSITION_02_DESK_DIALOGUE_02
writing.text: Hey did you hear about the new song by The Clash?

writing.name: DAY2_TRANSITION_02_DESK_DIALOGUE_03
writing.text: No, but my dad just borrowed the longplay with their latest song!

writing.name: DAY2_TRANSITION_02_DESK_DIALOGUE_04
writing.text: We should hear it sometime. It's awesome.

writing.name: DAY2_TRANSITION_02_DESK_DIALOGUE_04_CHOICE_01
writing.text: Invite Ash over and listen to The Clash

writing.name: DAY2_TRANSITION_02_DESK_DIALOGUE_04_CHOICE_02
writing.text: Invite Max over and listen to Bon Jovi

writing.name: DAY2_TRANSITION_02_DESK_DIALOGUE_04_CHOICE_03
writing.text: There's homework to do! Leave the fun for another day.

writing.name: DAY2_TRANSITION_03_LIVING_ROOM_ASH_DIALOGUE_01
writing.text: The Clash starts playing in the background.

writing.name: DAY2_TRANSITION_03_LIVING_ROOM_ASH_DIALOGUE_02
writing.text: That song is so good! It'll be a hit!

writing.name: DAY2_TRANSITION_03_LIVING_ROOM_ASH_DIALOGUE_03
writing.text: You enjoy a nice evening together and learn more about Ash.

writing.name: DAY2_TRANSITION_03_LIVING_ROOM_ASH_DIALOGUE_04
writing.text: He's quite impulsive and seems to have a little inner daredevil.

writing.name: DAY2_TRANSITION_03_LIVING_ROOM_ASH_DIALOGUE_05
writing.text: He's quite fun and talkative.

writing.name: DAY2_TRANSITION_03_LIVING_ROOM_MAX_DIALOGUE_01
writing.text: Bon jovi starts playing in the background.

writing.name: DAY2_TRANSITION_03_LIVING_ROOM_MAX_DIALOGUE_02
writing.text: He's my favorite... By far!

writing.name: DAY2_TRANSITION_03_LIVING_ROOM_MAX_DIALOGUE_03
writing.text: You enjoy a nice evening together and learn more about Max.

writing.name: DAY2_TRANSITION_03_LIVING_ROOM_MAX_DIALOGUE_04
writing.text: She's quite extroverted, calm and seems to worry a lot.

writing.name: DAY2_TRANSITION_03_LIVING_ROOM_MAX_DIALOGUE_05
writing.text: She's funny but her jokes are horribly bad.
